item.title: Pushing Google's Autocorrect to the Limit
item.description: I only had a vague understanding of the word “endocrinology” when it popped up in a recent article, so I Googled it. Or at least, I tried to. Instead I typed “wndicromoly,” and was disappointed by the results, all due respect to Wendy Cromwell: My expectation was that Google would either automatically redirect me to the right results or at least politely ask, “Did I mean: endocrinology?
